game.name: Grim Dawn - Steam Loyalist Items Pack 3
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This collection of vanity items is themed around several of Grim Dawn’s enigmatic deities. Whether you are an old fan or picking up the game for the first time, you can be sure to find an exceptional new look to conquer Cairn in style.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This collection of vanity items is themed around several of Grim Dawn’s enigmatic deities. Whether you are an old fan or picking up the game for the first time, you can be sure to find an exceptional new look to conquer Cairn in style.
